sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_file_boards (file_board_no, file_board_title, file_board_description, file_board_file_name, file_board_file_size, user_no) values (files_seq.nextval, #title#, #description#, #fileName#, #fileSize#, #user.no#)
sqlMap.select: select A.file_board_no as no, A.file_board_title as title, A.file_board_description as description, A.file_board_deleted as deleted, A.user_no as "user.no", B.user_name as "user.name", A.file_board_file_name as fileName, A.file_board_file_size as fileSize, A.file_board_updated_date as updatedDate, A.file_board_created_date as createdDate from comm_file_boards A, comm_users B where A.file_board_deleted = 'N' and A.user_no = B.user_no order by A.file_board_no desc

select A.file_board_no as no, A.file_board_title as title, A.file_board_description as description, A.file_board_deleted as deleted, A.user_no as "user.no", B.user_name as "user.name", A.file_board_file_name as fileName, A.file_board_file_size as fileSize, A.file_board_updated_date as updatedDate, A.file_board_created_date as createdDate from comm_file_boards A, comm_users B where A.file_board_no = #value# and A.file_board_deleted = 'N' and A.user_no = B.user_no
